content.body: Hey all! Please welcome Nic as our new TG4 co-convenor!! littledan is stepping back a bit since he's involved in so many other cool projects (thank you so much Dan!!) but Nic is going to continue helping to organize things and communicate our progress with TC39!
content.formatted_body: Hey all! Please welcome Nic as our new TG4 co-convenor!! littledan is stepping back a bit since he's involved in so many other cool projects (thank you so much Dan!!) but Nic is going to continue helping to organize things and communicate our progress with TC39!
